name: Simple 1500 Series: Vol.37 - The Picture & Slide Puzzle
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

This title includes illustration puzzle and slide puzzle, the golden combination of brain-twister puzzles!
Illustration puzzle includes a total of 500 monochrome and colour puzzles, as well as 100 slide puzzles.
Paint, remove and marking actions are all easy to control.
Two-play battle is available for slide puzzle.
9 pieces to 25 pieces are included.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
